message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1800000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on this amazing product, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not sure I'm willing to pay $1800000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1400000. Can you meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $1400000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to consider a compromise. I'm thinking of a price closer to $1600000. This is a great product, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your offer and my original price. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1600000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $1300000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1300000. I'm still confident that this product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1400000 and $1300000. How about we try $1350000?
I'm not sure I'm willing to pay $1350000. I'm still thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Can you meet me at that price?
